meanings.def: a box, bottle, etc. in which something can be stored or transported
examples: in a container Food will last longer if kept in an airtight container.
container of something These women carry heavy containers of water over long distances.
container for something containers for nuclear materials
Keep the seeds in an airtight container.
Store food in durable containers with lids.
Tubes are the ideal container for paint as air is excluded.

meanings.def: a large metal or wooden box of a standard size in which goods are packed so that they can easily be lifted onto a ship, train, etc. to be transported
examples: a container ship (= one designed to transport such containers)
It's a thirty thousand tonne container ship.

meanings.def: a box or pot made of wood, clay, plastic, etc. for growing plants in
examples: Planting bulbs in containers is a great alternative if you don't have a garden.
